item.description:
Hey everyone,

I've organized this pub crawl (The Drink & Drool - made up of relatives, friends, friends of friends and complete strangers) going on 7 years now and I wanted to extend the invitation to all my fellow Beer Meetup members.

Here's the schedule:
4-4:30 Green Dragon, 11 Marshall Street
4:30-5 Hennessy's, 25 Union Street
5-5:30 The Tap, 19 Union Street
5:30-6 Purple Shamrock, 1 Union Street
6-6:30 Black Horse Tavern, 340 Faneuil Hall Marketplace
6:30-7 Hong Kong, 65 Chatham Street
7-7:30 Black Rose, 160 State Street
7:30-8 Clark's in Faneuil Hall, 21 Merchant's Row
8-8:30 Hub Pub, 18 Province Street
8:30-9 Beantown Pub, 100 Tremont Street
9-9:30 21st Amendment, 150 Bowdoin Street - Beacon Hill
9:30-10 Kinsale Irish Pub, 2 Center Plaza

A limited supply of t-shirts are available for $10 each. They are arriving on Friday and they go quickly so if you would like one, please let me know and we'll need to make arrangements for the "exchange" prior to the crawl as carrying around a boatload of shirts to the crawl is not my cup of tea! :-) I'll be in Waltham Friday night (at the Wave for karaoke - a meetup will be organized momentarily) and hanging around Waltham Saturday morning.

Hope to see you all there! And as I tell all my friends on the crawl - at some point I might not remember that I saw you there, but I know I'll be happy that I saw you just the same :-)

Cathy
item.how_to_find_us: Everyone will be wearing light blue t-shirts with the logo on the back
item.name: 7th Annual Drink & Drool Pub Crawl
